dkeep.logic

Class Ogre

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Character
      • dkeep.logic.Ogre
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Ogre
extends Character
    The ogre is another character of the game. The Ogre moves randomly in one of four directions (up, down, left, right) and have a massive club for kill the hero
    Author:
    davidfalcao
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
